text: Jesús Alfredo Guzmán Salazar (born 17 May 1986) is a Mexican drug lord and high-ranking member of the Sinaloa Cartel, a criminal group based in the state of Sinaloa. He is the son of the drug lord Joaquín "El Chapo" Guzmán, once considered Mexico's most-wanted drug lord and the world's most-wanted criminal. Guzmán is suspected of being a leader within a Sinaloa Cartel faction often referred to as Los Chapitos. == References == Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican drug lords Category:Criminals by nationality Category:People from Sinaloa
title: Jesús Alfredo Guzmán Salazar
